modName: DVA Blue Vampire Eye Replacer With Variable Iris
summary: The Iris shrinks and grows depending on the Night Vision Level
descriptionHtml:
[heading]What it does[/heading]

The Iris shrinks and grows depending on the Night Vision Level

[youtube]fzPFiX47yKs[/youtube]

[heading]Requirements & Installation[/heading]

You need: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41634/?]Dynamic Vampire Appearance[/url]

Unzip the files into the Skyrim folder keeping the directory structure intact
SO the textures will go to ..SkyrimDataTexturesActorsCharacterDVAEyes.

[heading]Known Issues & Disclaimer[/heading]

Unfortunately I can only visualize 2 states with DVA, because it only replaces the glowing/non-glowing eye textures. There is also a delay in the DVA script, which updates the texture a little bit later than the night vision effect kicks in. It might seem that the iris reacts incorrectly to more light in the scene, but there is not more light in the scene. It's a cause and effect timing problem. I don't know how to make the iris react faster, though. If somebody knows how to bind it to the adaptation system of the game engine instead of the DVA script, please let me know.

I found the base eye texture on internet and modified it using Gimp.
I don't know whether I have permission or not, so if anone is bothered, please tell me and I am taking down the file.

Otherwise I also don't care about permissions.
Do what you like with the files.

[heading]Credits[/heading]

DVA Team
Bethesda
etc.

There are too many modders to mention,
so thank you guys generally for modding this great game.
author: Mindvampire
